name: Swords and Might
description:
This is a project I worked on to understand unity. This is my first. I hope you don't pay just for a test and some assets I took from market and made them work together, but if you do I thank you very much.

These are the assets I used to make this:
-Full Menu System - FREE (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/full-menu-system-free-158919)

-POLYGON - Fantasy Kingdom (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/polygon-fantasy-kingdom-164532)

-POLYGON - Dungeons Pack (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/polygon-dungeons-pack-102677) 

-Third Person Controller - Melee Combat Template (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/third-person-controller-melee-combat-template-44227)

-and others...

I do not own or created any of them and all the credits go to the devs who did an amazing job developing them.

For more please read README.txt
